Sorry to hear that! Drink plenty of fluids, such as water or electrolyte-rich drinks like coconut water or sports drinks, to help your body recover and regulate its temperature.

You can try taking over-the-counter medications like acetaminophen (Tylenol) or ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin) to help reduce your fever. Always follow the recommended dosage instructions and consult with your doctor if your fever persists or worsens.
